channel.title: NPC Help
channel.description:
I'm spawning a Chaos Elemental, but after I restart server it says this:
[Cache] Loading cache... [Cache] Loaded cache! [MapXTEA] Loaded 1502 map XTEA key(s) [PacketManager] Loading packet handlers... [PacketManager] Loaded 60 packet handlers. [World] Loading World... [ClanManager] Loading clans.... [ClanManager] Loaded 47 clans. [AreaManager] Loading areas... [AreaManager] Loaded 48 areas. [NPCDropLoader] Loading drops... [NPCDropLoader] Loaded 2651 drops [SpellContainer] Loading magic spells... [SpellContainer] Loaded 43 magic spell handlers. [SpecialAttackContainer] Loading special attacks... [SpecialAttackContainer] Loaded 37 special attacks. [DialogueManager] Loading dialogues... [DialogueManager] Loaded 58 dialogues. [DialogueManager] Loading NPC dialogue ids... [DialogueManager] Loaded 7 NPC dialogue ids. [ShopManager] Loaded 36 Shops [ObjectManager] Loading objects... [ObjectManager] Loaded 35 objects. [ItemDefinition] Loading item definitions... [ItemDefinition] Loaded 20430 item definitions. [RangeWeapon] Loading range weapon info... [RangeWeapon] Loaded 184 range weapon definitions. [Ammunition] Loading range ammunition info... [Ammunition] Loaded 219 ammunition definitions. [NPCDefinition] Loading npc definitions... [NPCDefinition] Loaded 13488 npc definitions. [NPCLoader] Loading customized NPC classes... [NPCLoader] Loaded 86 customized NPCs. [NPCLoader] Loading default npc spawns... Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NumberFormatException: For input string: "0 true" at java.lang.NumberFormatException.forInputString(NumberFormatException. java:65) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Integer.java:492) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Integer.java:527) at org.dementhium.model.npc.NPCLoader.load(NPCLoader.java:53) at org.dementhium.model.World.load(World.java:124) at org.dementhium.RS2ServerBootstrap.main(RS2ServerBootstrap.java:43) Loaded Server. Press any key to continue . . .
I deleted the line i added, and it still says the error?
EDIT: Anyone know how to make NPCs give XP like Dungeoneering when I kill one? or talk to?

item.title: NPC Help
item.dc:creator: @ohokay ohokay
item.description:
@ohokay wrote:

Number format exception?

As for the EXP adding, find the case of the NPC

Your adding skill xp method may be different, so just find it in your source and make changes.

Read full topic

item.title: NPC Help

item.description:
